name: Real City Gang War shooter
description:
Real City Gang War shooter

The streets of your city are deadly and full of crime. Build up your gang and fight to survive and thrive in these dangerous neighborhoods.

Unleash the desire to become Mafia Don by bringing others into your mob and spreading your influence throughout the world.
Your rival gang lords are no ordinary thugs, they are most wanted criminals by San Andreas police force. Grab automatic weapons like

M9 pistol or AK47 assault rifle and take over Vegas streets.Start shooting rival gang members and thugs.
There’s blood on city streets after cold gang wars between famous gangsta groups.
In a place where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tightly and take part in the wildest mafia wars ever!

Gang Wars Vegas City Features:

=> Multiple weapons like AK47 and M9 rifle to shoot enemy
=> Real life crime situations and heavy fire exchange between gangs
=> Smooth touch and realistic controls for precise shooting and headshots
=> Console quality 3D graphics and amazing sounds
=> realistic combat experience, rich combat action and combat sound
